description: An RPG for Discord - Boba Edition.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Adventure cog, based on the GoblinsComic Adventure Party cog by locastan. This project is a fork done by the orginal 4 authors in the authors list, and modified and adopted for the enjoyment of a small group of friends. Use `[p]load adventure` to get started and check out `[p]help Adventure`.
short: An RPG for Discord - Boba Edition.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data provided by users for the express purpose of redisplaying. It does not store user data which was not provided through a command. Users may remove their own content without making a data removal request. This cog does not support data requests, but will respect deletion requests.
